title: Cash is king: bipartisan bill seeks to preserve cash payment rights
shortDescription: A bipartisan bill seeks to require businesses to accept cash payments under $500 and ban extra fees for using cash.

title: Petition calls for creation of Trump County, Florida. What to know
shortDescription: A Florida woman's petition calls for a new Trump County along the Sunshine State's northeast coast. It'd be Florida's first new county in 100 years.

title: Watch live: Melania Trump welcomes White House Christmas Tree
shortDescription: The arrival of the huge concolor fir marks the 59th year of a Christmas tradition.

title: White House Christmas tree arrives. Will Barron Trump be there?
shortDescription: Melania Trump welcomes official White House Christmas tree. Barron Trump joined her for this in 2017. A look at some past Christmas controversies.

title: Trump to unveil proposal to address Obamacare subsidies
shortDescription: Trump is expected to propose a policy framework to address health care costs that includes extending Obamacare subsidies, according to reports.

title: Michigan farm provides the 2025 White House Christmas tree
shortDescription: The official Christmas tree that will adorn the White House in 2025 was provided by Korson's Tree Farms. Here's what to know about the Michigan farm.

title: Will redistricting efforts favor Republicans or Democrats? | The Excerpt
shortDescription: The question many are asking is whether 2025’s redistricting efforts are about upholding democracy or diluting representation?

title: Will redistricting efforts favor Republicans or Democrats?
shortDescription: The question many are asking is whether 2025’s redistricting efforts are about upholding democracy or diluting representation?

title: Trump revives calls for Chicago crackdown after downtown shooting
shortDescription: President Donald Trump’s comments come days after the Pentagon withdrew some National Guard troops he sent to Chicago.

title: Donald Trump's DOGE is done after less than a year. What to know.
shortDescription: DOGE is done, after thousands of federal workers were laid off and the agency reported only a fraction of the savings it promised.

title: Mamdani says he still thinks Trump is a 'fascist' after friendly meeting
shortDescription: New York City Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani said on "Meet the Press" that he stands by his previous comments on Trump, days after the pair's chummy meeting.

title: World leaders gather after Trump sets deadline for Russia-Ukraine plan
shortDescription: Ukrainian, American and European officials gathered in Geneva on Nov. 23 to discuss a draft plan presented by Washington to end the war in Ukraine.

title: Donald Trump debuts colorful new look
shortDescription: President Donald Trump, now friendly with New York City mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani and fighting with Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene, has a colorful new look.

title: Marjorie Taylor Greene resigns from Congress
shortDescription: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene announced she will resign from Congress after months of feuds with President Trump and top Republicans.
